title: Did Republican Rep. Mary Miller Invoke Hitler Before Capitol Riot?
subtitle: Miller's invocation of Adolf Hitler came a week after she claimed that Joe Biden's 2020 election victory was "the greatest heist of the 21st century."
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: Rep. Mary Miller said "Hitler was right on one thing" before a mob of Trump supporters stormed the nation's Capitol on Jan. 6, 2020..
